enabled.description: Indicate if the dump middleware is enabled or not. It should only be enabled in test environment.

mask.description: Indicate if the dump middleware should mask sensitive data.

logLevel.description: The log level for the dump middleware. ERROR | WARN | INFO | DEBUG | TRACE

indentSize.description: The indent size for the dump middleware.

useJson.description: Indicate if the dump middleware should use JSON format. If use json, indentSize option will be ignored.

requestEnabled.description: Indicate if the dump middleware should dump request.

request.description:
The request settings for the dump middleware.
request:
  url: true
  headers: true
  #filter for headers
  filteredHeaders:
  - Postman-Token
  - X-Correlation-Id
  - cookie
  cookies: true
  #filter for cookies
  filteredCookies:
  - Cookie_Gmail
  queryParameters: true
  #filter for queryParameters
  filteredQueryParameters:
  - itemId
  - a
  body: true

enabled.description: Indicate if the dump request middleware is enabled or not.

headers.description: Indicate if the headers should be dumped or not.

filteredHeaders.description: List of headers that should be filtered out from the dump.

cookies.description: Indicate if the cookies should be dumped or not.

filteredCookies.description: List of cookies that should be filtered out from the dump.

queryParameters.description: Indicate if the query parameters should be dumped or not.

filteredQueryParameters.description: List of query parameters that should be filtered

body.description: Indicate if the body should be dumped or not.

responseEnabled.description: Indicate if the dump middleware should dump response.

response.description:
The response settings for the dump middleware.
response:
  headers: true
  cookies: true
  body: true
  statusCode: true
